location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 11 of 1823 from John Macleod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushere [Bushire] to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is submitting contingent expenses to the Bombay Government, including boat hire, for the Resident's trip to the Arabian coast. It also submits the cost of a cash gift presented to Captain Frederick Faithfull, Commander of the HC Cruizer Ternate
